DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study compare multiple dos intravitreal microplasmin non-surgical PVD induction treatment patient DME .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter Study Compare Multiple Doses Intravitreal Microplasmin Versus Sham Injection Treatment Patients With Diabetic Macular Edema ( DME )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : patient > 18 year age Diabetic Macular Edema Exclusion Criteria include : PVD present baseline Vitreous hemorrhage Certain vitreoretinal condition include proliferative disease , rhegmatogenous retinal detachment , proliferative vitreoretinopathy ( PVR ) Patients vitrectomy study eye time
